name: Floppy Firefly Hands (Oculus Quest)
description:
Day 7 of the 12 Days of Sketchmas Game Jam. The theme prompt: Illumination

I wanted to experiment with making particles that each seek after a certain location on an animated mesh. In this case the particles each will fly towards their own particular spot on a hand, animated in VR.

Here's the git source code repository for the quick and dirty Unity 2019.4.17f1  project:
Source code repository
